text:
Image generation is the most that is talked about on the internet.
Let's go through the various ways that images can be generated by AI.

Text to Image generation:
Images are created from text prompts
(Add an example of Text - Image generation)

Image to Image generation:
Images are manipulated, this could be:
sizing up an image,
removing a background,
regenerating a previously generated image.
(Add an example of Image - Image generation)

Noise to Image generation:
Random pixels are turned into an image
(Add an example of Noise to Image generation)
We will learn more about image generation in the Deepfake Images module
Please click on either Text, Image, Audio, or Video
